ISSUE.TITLE: ConditionsOfUse Popup don't show on linux servers

The requested page (/t-popup/conditionsofuse) was not found While investigatig the problem I disovered the correct path would be case sensitive /t-popup/ConditionsOfUse It works wll after replacing conditionsofuse with ConditionsOfUse at the files: Nop.Web\Views\Checkout\Confirm.cshtml Nop.Web\Views\Checkout\OpcConfirmOrder.cshtml Nop.Web\Views\Shared\Components\OrderSummary\Default.cshtml
